DataElement.preferredName: Current Dialysis Chronic Renal Failure Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether or not dialysis was currently performed for chronic renal failure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Current Dialysis Chronic Renal Failure Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._A procedure to remove toxic substances from the blood that is used in patients with end-stage chronic kidney disease or acute kidney failure. This includes hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis.:Impairment of the renal function due to chronic kidney damage._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:The process of cleansing the blood when the kidneys are not able to filter the blood.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A procedure to remove toxic substances from the blood that is used in patients with end-stage chronic kidney disease or acute kidney failure. This includes hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Impairment of the renal function due to chronic kidney damage._Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Impairment of the renal function due to chronic kidney damage.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator

The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
